body_html:
Hi @asimshankar ,

Did you get chance to look into this ?
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/v1.0.1/tensorflow/tools/test/system_info_lib.py#L93

As per my point of view -
It should not just assume that the l2_cache_size will be there:

  # Gather the rest
  info = cpuinfo.get_cpu_info()
  cpu_info.cpu_info = info['brand']
  cpu_info.num_cores = info['count']
  cpu_info.mhz_per_cpu = info['hz_advertised_raw'][0] / 1.0e6
  l2_cache_size = re.match(r'(\d+)', str(info['l2_cache_size']))
  if l2_cache_size:
    # If a value is returned, it's in KB
   cpu_info.cache_size['L2'] = int(l2_cache_size.group(0)) * 1024

It could be changed to something like:

  # Gather the rest
  info = cpuinfo.get_cpu_info()
  cpu_info.cpu_info = info.get('brand', None)
  cpu_info.num_cores = info.get('count', None)
  cpu_info.mhz_per_cpu = info.get('hz_advertised_raw', (0, 0))[0] / 1.0e6
  if 'l2_cache_size' in info:
      l2_cache_size = re.match(r'(\d+)', str(info['l2_cache_size'])) 
      cpu_info.cache_size['L2'] = int(l2_cache_size.group(0)) * 1024

I am not sure whether it is correct or not, please guide me to make changes in system_info_lib.py file to support this case.

body:
Hi @asimshankar ,

Did you get chance to look into this ?
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/v1.0.1/tensorflow/tools/test/system_info_lib.py#L93

As per my point of view -
It should not just assume that the l2_cache_size will be there:

```
  # Gather the rest
  info = cpuinfo.get_cpu_info()
  cpu_info.cpu_info = info['brand']
  cpu_info.num_cores = info['count']
  cpu_info.mhz_per_cpu = info['hz_advertised_raw'][0] / 1.0e6
  l2_cache_size = re.match(r'(\d+)', str(info['l2_cache_size']))
  if l2_cache_size:
    # If a value is returned, it's in KB
   cpu_info.cache_size['L2'] = int(l2_cache_size.group(0)) * 1024
```

It could be changed to something like:

```
  # Gather the rest
  info = cpuinfo.get_cpu_info()
  cpu_info.cpu_info = info.get('brand', None)
  cpu_info.num_cores = info.get('count', None)
  cpu_info.mhz_per_cpu = info.get('hz_advertised_raw', (0, 0))[0] / 1.0e6
  if 'l2_cache_size' in info:
      l2_cache_size = re.match(r'(\d+)', str(info['l2_cache_size'])) 
      cpu_info.cache_size['L2'] = int(l2_cache_size.group(0)) * 1024

```
I am not sure whether it is correct or not, please guide me to make changes in system_info_lib.py file to support this case.
